messages.caption: St. Patrick
messages.firstItem: Greetings, good chap! While me went for the loo, some cranky Nicho stole all me gold! Can ye help me find em gold? Me promises you shall receive a reward...
messages.idleMessage: Yeh yeh, ye got the reward already chap!
messages.noItem: Exquisite! Now ye need find {0} more for ye reward.
messages.questComplete: Ye did one JOLLY good job! Here take em reward me promise..
messages.questTask: Ye shall go now!! Me is growing bored...
